name: Staircase
description:
*BETA FEEDBACK*
"Absolutely Gorgeous"
"A spiritual and cathartic experience"
"I didn't know what to expect, but when I came out of it I was lighter. Like a huge weight had been lifted and a light had been shown on the very piece of me I needed to confront. I fully intend to revisit this often."

This is not a game you can win or lose.
This is an experience for you and you alone. 

Based on an actual mediation exercise, this game aims to give you a place to look deeply into your fears, your hopes and yourself.  This is my gift. From me to you. I hope it helps you as much as it has helped me. 

See you on the other side. 

Controls: WASD/ArrowKeys + Mouse

Click here to go to the Official Soundtrack $3.00
